item.title: Best My Strange Addiction Episodes
item.description: My Strange Addiction is an American documentary television series that premiered on TLC on December 29, 2010. The series focuses on people with unusual compulsive behaviors. These range from eating specific non-food items to ritualistic daily activities to bizarre personal fixations or beliefs. My Strange Addiction is an American docu-biography tv-series that was first aired in 2010. See the best episodes of My Strange Addiction below.

item.title: Best 30 for 30 Episodes
item.description: 30 for 30 is the umbrella title for a series of documentary films airing on ESPN and its sister networks and online properties. The series, which highlights people and events in the sports world that have generally received small amounts of attention, has featured two ‘volumes’ of 30 episodes each, a 13-episode series under the ESPN Films Presents title in 2011-2012, and a series of 30 for 30 Shorts shown through the ESPN.com website. See the best episodes of 30 for 30 below.
